title: Raspberry Prosecco Cocktail
instructions: Raspberry Syrup: Place sugar & 2 c water in red sauce pan over med heat. Bring to simmer until dissolved. Add lemon juice & raspberries & simmer until raspberries have broken down, about 10 mins. Pour mixture through a strainer & return to pot. Simmer over med heat until syrup has thickened, about 10 min more. Let cool completely then pour into airtight container & store in refrigerator for up to 2 wks. Cocktail: Add raspberry syrup & lemon juice to bottom of champagne flute. Fill with prosecco.
